alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 03 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT/730 PM EDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama, Panhandle Florida and southwest Georgia, including the following counties, in southeast Alabama, Geneva and Houston. In Panhandle Florida, Jackson. In southwest Georgia, Early. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT /730 PM EDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 323 PM CDT /423 PM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Malone, Malvern, Rehobeth, Avon, Esto, Madrid, Gordon, Black, Bascom, Memphis and Lovetown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
